tidbits.title: Sugar Cane Legacy
tidbits.description: Historically known for its sugar production, Saint Kitts and Nevis once had a thriving sugar industry that significantly shaped its economy and history.

tidbits.title: Dual-Island Nation
tidbits.description: As the smallest sovereign state in the Americas, Saint Kitts and Nevis consists of two islands, Saint Kitts and Nevis, each offering unique landscapes and cultural experiences.

tidbits.title: Old Colonial Architecture
tidbits.description: The islands boast charming colonial architecture, including Brimstone Hill Fortress on Saint Kitts, recognized as a UNESCO World Heritage Site for its historical significance.
